Hi gurus  for the HSBC EGA giro setup  how long does it take for the application? And the 1% giro cashback is it capped? I have a $15k crmc cc bill that is due this month  so I'm wondering if I could get 1% =$150 back by setting up the EGA giro. Thanks!
3 weeks. Yes  $300/$500 depending on what customer tier. Too late for your CRMC bill unless you setup 1 month ago.

Very strange is I send the giro form to uob n hsbc informed me giro setup is completed. This mean uob had sent the form to hsbc  But latest uob statement still show giro not yet setup.
Yes. They will SMS  but not completed. In fact  they will SMS completed if failed due to x reason.
